title: Textile, mid-20th century
medium:
Medium: 
Technique: two intercrossed plain weave structures (double cloth)
inscribed: Label glued to side hem, "HANDWOVEN, TRUDE GUERMONPREZ."
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Length of woven fabric with a large-scale checkerboard in off-white, with some black warps forming fine irregular horizontal stripes. One layer of the double cloth is woven with over-twisted yarns, giving puckered effects.

tombstone.epitaph:
